article:
A 'colloquialism' is a word, phrase, or paralanguage that is employed in
conversational or informal language but not in formal speech or formal
writing. colloquial. (n.d.) Dictionary.com Unabridged (v 1.1). Retrieved
September 10, 2008, from [http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/colloquial
Dictionary.com] Dictionaries often display colloquial words and phrases
with the abbreviation colloq. as an identifier. Colloquialisms are sometimes
referred to collectively as "colloquial language". colloquialism. (n.d.).
Dictionary.com Unabridged (v 1.1). Retrieved September 10, 2008, from
[http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/colloquialism Dictionary.com] A
'colloquial name' is a word or term used for identification that is employed in
conversational or informal language but not in formal speech or formal writing.
